additionalRemarks._instruction: Enter any additional remarks concerning this measurement.

measuredQuantity._instruction: Add the quantity that was measured during this measurement.

measuredWith._instruction: Add the device that was used during this measurement.

timestamp._instruction: Enter the date and time on which this measurement was made, formatted as '2023-02-07T16:00:00+00:00'.

value._instruction: Enter all values that were measured at the same time and are of the same measured quantity.
